content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":264052,"originalJapaneseLine":"大丈夫、偵察隊を出しているけど周囲数キロに魔軍はいないのは確認済み","translatedEnglishLine":"It's okay, we've sent out reconnaissance units and confirmed there are no demon armies within several kilometers around."},{"lineNumber":264053,"originalJapaneseLine":"夜だし・・煙が立っても・・見えないし大丈夫","translatedEnglishLine":"It's night... even if smoke rises... you can't see it, so it's fine."},{"lineNumber":264054,"originalJapaneseLine":"みんなここまでの移動だけでなんとなくヘトヘト","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone is somehow exhausted just from moving up to this point."},{"lineNumber":264055,"originalJapaneseLine":"遂に敵地に来たんだ、これからの決戦かと緊張気味の子も","translatedEnglishLine":"We've finally come to enemy territory; some are a bit nervous thinking about the upcoming decisive battle."},{"lineNumber":264056,"originalJapaneseLine":"でもまだまだ頑張れるよ希望をもってがんばろうと","translatedEnglishLine":"But we can still keep going; with hope, let's do our best."},{"lineNumber":264057,"originalJapaneseLine":"ささやかな宴会","translatedEnglishLine":"A modest feast."},{"lineNumber":264058,"originalJapaneseLine":"海岸、夜","translatedEnglishLine":"The beach, at night."},{"lineNumber":264059,"originalJapaneseLine":"キャンプが作られ、ささやかな宴会","translatedEnglishLine":"A camp is set up, and there’s a modest banquet."},{"lineNumber":264060,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは離れた所で一人立って食べていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance stood alone at a distance, eating by himself."},{"lineNumber":264061,"originalJapaneseLine":"こんな所に居たのですかとシィルが現れた","translatedEnglishLine":"“So you were here,” Syiru appeared."},{"lineNumber":264062,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最終決戦に備えて最後の宴会の雰囲気","translatedEnglishLine":"The atmosphere of the last feast in preparation for the final battle."},{"lineNumber":264063,"originalJapaneseLine":"　みんな明日が大変な戦いになるのが分かっているから無理してはしゃいでいる","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone knows tomorrow will be a tough battle, so they’re forcing themselves to be lively."},{"lineNumber":264064,"originalJapaneseLine":"　で、俺の元に来て、俺に話しかけてくる・・　明日がんばりましょうとか、きっと勝てますとか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, they come to me and speak... saying things like 'Let’s do our best tomorrow' or 'We will definitely win'..."},{"lineNumber":264065,"originalJapaneseLine":"　また何か相談がありますとか、ああ、露骨に俺様に誘いを待っているなぁという子も・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Or saying they have something to discuss, and there are also those blatantly waiting for my invitation..."},{"lineNumber":264066,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様が望まれていたハーレム状態では？","translatedEnglishLine":"Isn't this the harem situation Lord Rance desired?"},{"lineNumber":264067,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・そうなのだが、そうだな、俺の望んだ状態のはずだが・・なんというかな。","translatedEnglishLine":"...That's true, it should be the state I wished for, but... how should I put it."},{"lineNumber":264068,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺もしんみりしたいというか物思いに時間を費やしたいというか、そういう訳だ","translatedEnglishLine":"I want to be contemplative, or rather spend some time in thought; that's the reason."},{"lineNumber":264069,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ランス様、かっこいい　最後の戦いに備えて心を落ち着けておられるのですね）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Lord Rance is so cool. He is calming his mind in preparation for the final battle.)"},{"lineNumber":264070,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ、そうですよね、ランス様も一人になりたい時があるのも当然・・私も向こうにいっておきます","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, that's right. Of course Lord Rance sometimes wants to be alone... I'll go over there then."},{"lineNumber":264071,"originalJapaneseLine":"まて・・とシィルの手を掴む","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wait...\" I grabbed Syiru’s hand."},{"lineNumber":264072,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前は俺の奴隷だ、料理取ってきたりここで小間使いやれ","translatedEnglishLine":"You are my slave. Go fetch some food and serve as my attendant here."},{"lineNumber":264073,"originalJapaneseLine":"はい！（うれしい）","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes! (happy)"},{"lineNumber":264074,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},{"lineNumber":264075,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・時間経過","translatedEnglishLine":"...Time passes."},{"lineNumber":264076,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},{"lineNumber":264077,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぱこん、ぱこん、と森の木陰でシィルを抱くランス","translatedEnglishLine":"*pacon, pacon* Rance holds Syiru in the shade of the forest."},{"lineNumber":264078,"originalJapaneseLine":"あれ・・ランス様、ここは、そのしんみりとしたロマンチックなシーンだったのでは・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey... Lord Rance, wasn’t this supposed to be a quiet, romantic scene...?"},{"lineNumber":264079,"originalJapaneseLine":"何を言っている最終決戦に向けて高まった俺様の熱いパトスがこのままでは暴発してしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"What are you saying? My heated passion built up for the final battle is about to explode if I don’t do something."},{"lineNumber":264080,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうならない為に少し抜いて冷静になるのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"To prevent that, I need to relieve some of it and calm down."},{"lineNumber":264081,"originalJapaneseLine":"大切な戦いの前に疲れてしまうのでは・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Won't you get tired before the important battle...?"},{"lineNumber":264082,"originalJapaneseLine":"じゃ、３発で我慢しよう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, I’ll restrain myself to three times."},{"lineNumber":264083,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・時間経過","translatedEnglishLine":"...Time passes."},{"lineNumber":264084,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様・・もう寝ないと明日にひびきますよ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rance... if you don't sleep soon, it will affect tomorrow..."},{"lineNumber":264085,"originalJapaneseLine":"うむ、なんか今日は絶好調、次から次へと性欲がわき起こるのだ。やりたりない","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, I’m in top form today, my lust is rising one after another. It's not enough."},{"lineNumber":264086,"originalJapaneseLine":"私、もうフラフラです・・たぶん、もう７発目・・いや８発？　何回いかされたのか分からない・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m already dazed... probably the seventh time... no, the eighth? I don’t even know how many times I’ve come..."},{"lineNumber":264087,"originalJapaneseLine":"夜が更けていくという感じでフェードアウト","translatedEnglishLine":"Fade out with the feeling of the night deepening."},{"lineNumber":264088,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスは何故かやめない、死ぬかもしれないという緊張状態から種の保存本能から性欲が高まっている","translatedEnglishLine":"For some reason, Rance doesn't stop; in this tense state where he might die, his instinct to preserve his species heightens his sexual desire."},{"lineNumber":264089,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスも緊張している、少し寝れない。そんな感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance is also tense, can’t sleep well. That kind of feeling."},{"lineNumber":264090,"originalJapaneseLine":"　文章では表現しないで形で表現してほしいな","translatedEnglishLine":"I want this expressed not in words but visually."},{"lineNumber":264091,"originalJapaneseLine":"最後の晩、宴会","translatedEnglishLine":"The last night, the banquet."},{"lineNumber":264092,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスと他の女の子達・・適度に楽しげに会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the other girls... moderately enjoying their conversation."},{"lineNumber":264093,"originalJapaneseLine":"そしてそろそろ夜が更けてきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"And the night is gradually deepening."},{"lineNumber":264094,"originalJapaneseLine":"よーし、今夜は誰と・・ん、シィルを見ると気持ち良さそうに眠っていた","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, who tonight... huh, looking at Syiru, she was sleeping comfortably."},{"lineNumber":264095,"originalJapaneseLine":"こいつ奴隷のくせにご主人様をほって寝やがって・・叩き起こして・・","translatedEnglishLine":"This guy’s my slave, yet she just left her master and fell asleep... I'll have to wake her up..."},{"lineNumber":264096,"originalJapaneseLine":"ま、いいか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, whatever..."},{"lineNumber":264097,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょっと離れた所でひとり酒を飲む","translatedEnglishLine":"He drinks alone a little apart from the others."},{"lineNumber":264098,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこにカフェがカオスを持ってくる、そしてカオスを置いて立ち去る","translatedEnglishLine":"Then Cafe brings Chaos, places him there, and leaves."},{"lineNumber":264099,"originalJapaneseLine":"よう相棒、いよいよ明日だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, partner, tomorrow’s finally the day."},{"lineNumber":264100,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだ、お前・・あっちいけ","translatedEnglishLine":"What the... you? Go away."},{"lineNumber":264101,"originalJapaneseLine":"まぁ、そういうなよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, don’t be like that."},{"lineNumber":264102,"originalJapaneseLine":"霊気でコップを持つとランスと乾杯して自分に酒をかぶせるカオス。","translatedEnglishLine":"With spiritual energy, Chaos holds a cup, toasts with Rance, and pours liquor over himself."},{"lineNumber":264103,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだか墓に酒をかけているみたいだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s kind of like pouring alcohol on a grave."},{"lineNumber":264104,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスて出会った俺は幸せ、お前はほんとすごい男だ","translatedEnglishLine":"Meeting Rance made me happy. You truly are an amazing man."},{"lineNumber":264105,"originalJapaneseLine":"　儂が人間だった時、魔人は一体も倒せなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"When I was human, I couldn’t defeat a single demon lord."},{"lineNumber":264106,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人を倒す力が欲しい・・そう願い、この姿になった","translatedEnglishLine":"I wanted the power to defeat demon lords... so I wished for that and took this form."},{"lineNumber":264107,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ガイが儂のオーナーになった時は期待した、あの男はすごかった","translatedEnglishLine":"When Guy became my owner, I had high hopes; that man was amazing."},{"lineNumber":264108,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あっ、ガイってのちの魔王になる男だぞ、すごい奴だったぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, Guy is the man who would become the Demon King later; he was incredible."},{"lineNumber":264109,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前なんかよりずっと強かった、かっこよかった、が・・甘かったのかな","translatedEnglishLine":"He was much stronger and cooler than you, but... maybe he was too naive."},{"lineNumber":264110,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人は一体も倒す事なく、奴自身が魔人になってしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Without defeating a single demon lord, he himself became one."},{"lineNumber":264111,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その後、儂はジルを封印する為にリーザスの地下へ・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"After that, I went underground in Leesas to seal Jill..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫、偵察隊を出しているけど周囲数キロに魔軍はいないのは確認済み
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's okay, we've sent out reconnaissance units and confirmed there are no demon armies within several kilometers around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜だし・・煙が立っても・・見えないし大丈夫
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's night... even if smoke rises... you can't see it, so it's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなここまでの移動だけでなんとなくヘトヘト
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone is somehow exhausted just from moving up to this point.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遂に敵地に来たんだ、これからの決戦かと緊張気味の子も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We've finally come to enemy territory; some are a bit nervous thinking about the upcoming decisive battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でもまだまだ頑張れるよ希望をもってがんばろうと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But we can still keep going; with hope, let's do our best.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ささやかな宴会
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A modest feast.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 海岸、夜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The beach, at night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャンプが作られ、ささやかな宴会
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A camp is set up, and there’s a modest banquet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは離れた所で一人立って食べていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance stood alone at a distance, eating by himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな所に居たのですかとシィルが現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “So you were here,” Syiru appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最終決戦に備えて最後の宴会の雰囲気
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The atmosphere of the last feast in preparation for the final battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな明日が大変な戦いになるのが分かっているから無理してはしゃいでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone knows tomorrow will be a tough battle, so they’re forcing themselves to be lively.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、俺の元に来て、俺に話しかけてくる・・　明日がんばりましょうとか、きっと勝てますとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, they come to me and speak... saying things like 'Let’s do our best tomorrow' or 'We will definitely win'...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また何か相談がありますとか、ああ、露骨に俺様に誘いを待っているなぁという子も・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or saying they have something to discuss, and there are also those blatantly waiting for my invitation...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様が望まれていたハーレム状態では？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn't this the harem situation Lord Rance desired?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・そうなのだが、そうだな、俺の望んだ状態のはずだが・・なんというかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...That's true, it should be the state I wished for, but... how should I put it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺もしんみりしたいというか物思いに時間を費やしたいというか、そういう訳だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to be contemplative, or rather spend some time in thought; that's the reason.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ランス様、かっこいい　最後の戦いに備えて心を落ち着けておられるのですね）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Lord Rance is so cool. He is calming his mind in preparation for the final battle.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、そうですよね、ランス様も一人になりたい時があるのも当然・・私も向こうにいっておきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, that's right. Of course Lord Rance sometimes wants to be alone... I'll go over there then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まて・・とシィルの手を掴む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wait..." I grabbed Syiru’s hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前は俺の奴隷だ、料理取ってきたりここで小間使いやれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You are my slave. Go fetch some food and serve as my attendant here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい！（うれしい）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes! (happy)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・時間経過
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Time passes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぱこん、ぱこん、と森の木陰でシィルを抱くランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *pacon, pacon* Rance holds Syiru in the shade of the forest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれ・・ランス様、ここは、そのしんみりとしたロマンチックなシーンだったのでは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey... Lord Rance, wasn’t this supposed to be a quiet, romantic scene...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何を言っている最終決戦に向けて高まった俺様の熱いパトスがこのままでは暴発してしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you saying? My heated passion built up for the final battle is about to explode if I don’t do something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうならない為に少し抜いて冷静になるのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To prevent that, I need to relieve some of it and calm down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大切な戦いの前に疲れてしまうのでは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Won't you get tired before the important battle...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃ、３発で我慢しよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, I’ll restrain myself to three times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・・時間経過
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Time passes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様・・もう寝ないと明日にひびきますよ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance... if you don't sleep soon, it will affect tomorrow...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ、なんか今日は絶好調、次から次へと性欲がわき起こるのだ。やりたりない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, I’m in top form today, my lust is rising one after another. It's not enough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、もうフラフラです・・たぶん、もう７発目・・いや８発？　何回いかされたのか分からない・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m already dazed... probably the seventh time... no, the eighth? I don’t even know how many times I’ve come...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜が更けていくという感じでフェードアウト
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fade out with the feeling of the night deepening.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは何故かやめない、死ぬかもしれないという緊張状態から種の保存本能から性欲が高まっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, Rance doesn't stop; in this tense state where he might die, his instinct to preserve his species heightens his sexual desire.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスも緊張している、少し寝れない。そんな感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance is also tense, can’t sleep well. That kind of feeling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 文章では表現しないで形で表現してほしいな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want this expressed not in words but visually.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後の晩、宴会
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The last night, the banquet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと他の女の子達・・適度に楽しげに会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the other girls... moderately enjoying their conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてそろそろ夜が更けてきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And the night is gradually deepening.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よーし、今夜は誰と・・ん、シィルを見ると気持ち良さそうに眠っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, who tonight... huh, looking at Syiru, she was sleeping comfortably.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつ奴隷のくせにご主人様をほって寝やがって・・叩き起こして・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This guy’s my slave, yet she just left her master and fell asleep... I'll have to wake her up...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、いいか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, whatever...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと離れた所でひとり酒を飲む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He drinks alone a little apart from the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにカフェがカオスを持ってくる、そしてカオスを置いて立ち去る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Cafe brings Chaos, places him there, and leaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よう相棒、いよいよ明日だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, partner, tomorrow’s finally the day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、お前・・あっちいけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What the... you? Go away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まぁ、そういうなよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, don’t be like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 霊気でコップを持つとランスと乾杯して自分に酒をかぶせるカオス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With spiritual energy, Chaos holds a cup, toasts with Rance, and pours liquor over himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだか墓に酒をかけているみたいだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s kind of like pouring alcohol on a grave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスて出会った俺は幸せ、お前はほんとすごい男だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meeting Rance made me happy. You truly are an amazing man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂が人間だった時、魔人は一体も倒せなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I was human, I couldn’t defeat a single demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人を倒す力が欲しい・・そう願い、この姿になった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wanted the power to defeat demon lords... so I wished for that and took this form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガイが儂のオーナーになった時は期待した、あの男はすごかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Guy became my owner, I had high hopes; that man was amazing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、ガイってのちの魔王になる男だぞ、すごい奴だったぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, Guy is the man who would become the Demon King later; he was incredible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前なんかよりずっと強かった、かっこよかった、が・・甘かったのかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was much stronger and cooler than you, but... maybe he was too naive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人は一体も倒す事なく、奴自身が魔人になってしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without defeating a single demon lord, he himself became one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、儂はジルを封印する為にリーザスの地下へ・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, I went underground in Leesas to seal Jill...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大丈夫、偵察隊を出しているけど周囲数キロに魔軍はいないのは確認済み
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's okay, we've sent out reconnaissance units and confirmed there are no demon armies within several kilometers around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜だし・・煙が立っても・・見えないし大丈夫
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's night... even if smoke rises... you can't see it, so it's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなここまでの移動だけでなんとなくヘトヘト
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone is somehow exhausted just from moving up to this point.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遂に敵地に来たんだ、これからの決戦かと緊張気味の子も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We've finally come to enemy territory; some are a bit nervous thinking about the upcoming decisive battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でもまだまだ頑張れるよ希望をもってがんばろうと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But we can still keep going; with hope, let's do our best.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ささやかな宴会
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A modest feast.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 海岸、夜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The beach, at night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャンプが作られ、ささやかな宴会
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A camp is set up, and there’s a modest banquet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは離れた所で一人立って食べていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance stood alone at a distance, eating by himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな所に居たのですかとシィルが現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: “So you were here,” Syiru appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最終決戦に備えて最後の宴会の雰囲気
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The atmosphere of the last feast in preparation for the final battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな明日が大変な戦いになるのが分かっているから無理してはしゃいでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone knows tomorrow will be a tough battle, so they’re forcing themselves to be lively.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、俺の元に来て、俺に話しかけてくる・・　明日がんばりましょうとか、きっと勝てますとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, they come to me and speak... saying things like 'Let’s do our best tomorrow' or 'We will definitely win'...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また何か相談がありますとか、ああ、露骨に俺様に誘いを待っているなぁという子も・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or saying they have something to discuss, and there are also those blatantly waiting for my invitation...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様が望まれていたハーレム状態では？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn't this the harem situation Lord Rance desired?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・そうなのだが、そうだな、俺の望んだ状態のはずだが・・なんというかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...That's true, it should be the state I wished for, but... how should I put it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺もしんみりしたいというか物思いに時間を費やしたいというか、そういう訳だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to be contemplative, or rather spend some time in thought; that's the reason.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ランス様、かっこいい　最後の戦いに備えて心を落ち着けておられるのですね）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Lord Rance is so cool. He is calming his mind in preparation for the final battle.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、そうですよね、ランス様も一人になりたい時があるのも当然・・私も向こうにいっておきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, that's right. Of course Lord Rance sometimes wants to be alone... I'll go over there then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まて・・とシィルの手を掴む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wait..." I grabbed Syiru’s hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前は俺の奴隷だ、料理取ってきたりここで小間使いやれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You are my slave. Go fetch some food and serve as my attendant here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい！（うれしい）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes! (happy)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・時間経過
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Time passes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぱこん、ぱこん、と森の木陰でシィルを抱くランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *pacon, pacon* Rance holds Syiru in the shade of the forest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれ・・ランス様、ここは、そのしんみりとしたロマンチックなシーンだったのでは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey... Lord Rance, wasn’t this supposed to be a quiet, romantic scene...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何を言っている最終決戦に向けて高まった俺様の熱いパトスがこのままでは暴発してしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What are you saying? My heated passion built up for the final battle is about to explode if I don’t do something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうならない為に少し抜いて冷静になるのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To prevent that, I need to relieve some of it and calm down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大切な戦いの前に疲れてしまうのでは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Won't you get tired before the important battle...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃ、３発で我慢しよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, I’ll restrain myself to three times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・・時間経過
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Time passes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様・・もう寝ないと明日にひびきますよ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance... if you don't sleep soon, it will affect tomorrow...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ、なんか今日は絶好調、次から次へと性欲がわき起こるのだ。やりたりない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, I’m in top form today, my lust is rising one after another. It's not enough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、もうフラフラです・・たぶん、もう７発目・・いや８発？　何回いかされたのか分からない・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m already dazed... probably the seventh time... no, the eighth? I don’t even know how many times I’ve come...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜が更けていくという感じでフェードアウト
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fade out with the feeling of the night deepening.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは何故かやめない、死ぬかもしれないという緊張状態から種の保存本能から性欲が高まっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, Rance doesn't stop; in this tense state where he might die, his instinct to preserve his species heightens his sexual desire.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスも緊張している、少し寝れない。そんな感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance is also tense, can’t sleep well. That kind of feeling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 文章では表現しないで形で表現してほしいな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want this expressed not in words but visually.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後の晩、宴会
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The last night, the banquet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと他の女の子達・・適度に楽しげに会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the other girls... moderately enjoying their conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてそろそろ夜が更けてきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And the night is gradually deepening.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よーし、今夜は誰と・・ん、シィルを見ると気持ち良さそうに眠っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, who tonight... huh, looking at Syiru, she was sleeping comfortably.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつ奴隷のくせにご主人様をほって寝やがって・・叩き起こして・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This guy’s my slave, yet she just left her master and fell asleep... I'll have to wake her up...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、いいか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, whatever...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと離れた所でひとり酒を飲む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He drinks alone a little apart from the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにカフェがカオスを持ってくる、そしてカオスを置いて立ち去る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Cafe brings Chaos, places him there, and leaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よう相棒、いよいよ明日だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, partner, tomorrow’s finally the day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、お前・・あっちいけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What the... you? Go away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まぁ、そういうなよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, don’t be like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 霊気でコップを持つとランスと乾杯して自分に酒をかぶせるカオス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With spiritual energy, Chaos holds a cup, toasts with Rance, and pours liquor over himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだか墓に酒をかけているみたいだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s kind of like pouring alcohol on a grave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスて出会った俺は幸せ、お前はほんとすごい男だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meeting Rance made me happy. You truly are an amazing man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂が人間だった時、魔人は一体も倒せなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I was human, I couldn’t defeat a single demon lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人を倒す力が欲しい・・そう願い、この姿になった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wanted the power to defeat demon lords... so I wished for that and took this form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガイが儂のオーナーになった時は期待した、あの男はすごかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Guy became my owner, I had high hopes; that man was amazing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、ガイってのちの魔王になる男だぞ、すごい奴だったぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, Guy is the man who would become the Demon King later; he was incredible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前なんかよりずっと強かった、かっこよかった、が・・甘かったのかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was much stronger and cooler than you, but... maybe he was too naive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人は一体も倒す事なく、奴自身が魔人になってしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without defeating a single demon lord, he himself became one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、儂はジルを封印する為にリーザスの地下へ・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, I went underground in Leesas to seal Jill...
